Returns: True if this class is allowed to be inflated, or false otherwise
Parameters: Class: The class object for the View that is about to be inflated
onLoadClass(java.lang.Class).Description: Hook to allow clients of the LayoutInflater to restrict the set of Views that are allowed to be inflated.

ClassDesc: Hook to allow clients of the LayoutInflater to restrict the set of Views that are allowed to be inflated.
